name: Nazeebo
title: Heretic Witch Doctor
description: Specialist Rule breakers and masters of unconventional warfare.

role.name: Specialist
role.description: Specialist Rule breakers and masters of unconventional warfare.

abilities.name: Corpse Spiders
abilities.description: Hurl a jar of spiders that deals 50 damage. If it hits at least one enemy, create 3 Corpse Spiders that attack for 36 damage. Spiders last for 4 seconds.

abilities.name: Zombie Wall
abilities.description: After 1 second, create a ring of Zombies surrounding the target area that deal 28 damage and last for 3 seconds.

abilities.name: Plague of Toads
abilities.description: Create a wave of 3 Toads that explode on contact, dealing 126 damage over 6 seconds. This effect stacks. Stores up to 2 charges.

heroics.name: Gargantuan
heroics.description: Summon a Gargantuan to guard an area for 20 seconds. Deals 100 damage when summoned, attacks for 150 damage, and can be ordered to stomp nearby enemies.

heroics.name: Ravenous Spirit
heroics.description: Channel a Ravenous Spirit that deals 207 damage per second. Cannot move while channeling. Lasts for 8 seconds.
